description:
run.bash: set GOTRACEBACK=2
This is useful for debugging of episodic crashes.
https://codereview.appspot.com/7098050/ when submitted
won't enable full stacks for nil derefs.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

NOT LGTM

I still prefer my proposal. We may need to work out details but it is
better to show the added information exactly when it helps, not just during
a build.

On 2013/01/22 18:56:27, rsc wrote:
> NOT LGTM
> 
> I still prefer my proposal. We may need to work out details but it is
> better to show the added information exactly when it helps, not just during
> a build.

If we want to handle this in runtime, let's move the discussion to:
https://codereview.appspot.com/7098050/

subject: code review 7180044: run.bash: set GOTRACEBACK=2
